languages.text: "Меня позвали шепотки — те, которые я смогла разобрать среди прочих воплей и визгов. Те, кто качает лодку и хочет опрокинуть ее в варп, начали с больного — с {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Навигатора{/g}, проводника сквозь варп. Другие шепотки звали в инженерный отсек... но поздно. Я слышала крик нашей главной шестеренки... и тишину после".

traits.locale_text: "Меня позвали шепотки — те, которые я смогла разобрать среди прочих воплей и визгов. Те, кто качает лодку и хочет опрокинуть ее в варп, начали с больного — с {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Навигатора{/g}, проводника сквозь варп. Другие шепотки звали в инженерный отсек... но поздно. Я слышала крик нашей главной шестеренки... и тишину после".

languages.text: "The whispers called me — the ones I could make out among all the screams and screeches. Those who are rocking this boat hit us where it hurt — they went after the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, our guide through the warp. Other whispers called me to the enginarium... but it was too late. I heard the cry of our master cog... and the silence that followed."
languages.original_text: "Меня позвали шепотки — те, которые я смогла разобрать среди прочих воплей и визгов. Те, кто качает лодку и хочет опрокинуть ее в варп, начали с больного — с {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Навигатора{/g}, проводника сквозь варп. Другие шепотки звали в инженерный отсек... но поздно. Я слышала крик нашей главной шестеренки... и тишину после".

traits.locale_text: "The whispers called me — the ones I could make out among all the screams and screeches. Those who are rocking this boat hit us where it hurt — they went after the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, our guide through the warp. Other whispers called me to the engineering bay... but it was too late. I heard the cry of our master cog... and the silence that followed."

Other whispers called me to the engineering bay... but it was too late. I heard the cry of our master cog... and the silence that followed."

Those who are rocking this boat hit us where it hurt — they went after the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, our guide through the warp. Other whispers called me to the enginarium... but it was too late. I heard the cry of our master cog... and the silence that followed."

languages.text: “那些低语声在呼唤我，我指的是在所有的尖叫与惨叫之中能听得清的那些。那些袭击这艘船的敌人，他们击中了这艘船的要害部位。那些声音要求我去找{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}，也就是我们穿越亚空间的向导，而其他低语声则要求我去引擎区看看……但那个时候已经来不及了，我已经听到了主齿轮发出的尖叫声……以及接踵而来的死寂。”
languages.original_text: "The whispers called me — the ones I could make out among all the screams and screeches. Those who are rocking this boat hit us where it hurt — they went after the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, our guide through the warp. Other whispers called me to the enginarium... but it was too late. I heard the cry of our master cog... and the silence that followed."

traits.locale_text: “那些低语声在呼唤我，我指的是在所有的尖叫与惨叫之中能听得清的那些。那些袭击这艘船的敌人，他们击中了这艘船的要害部位。那些声音要求我去找{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}，也就是我们穿越亚空间的向导，而其他低语声则要求我去引擎区看看……但那个时候已经来不及了，我已经听到了主齿轮发出的尖叫声……以及接踵而来的死寂。”

languages.text: «Los susurros me llamaron; los pocos que pude distinguir entre los gritos y los chillidos. Nuestros atacantes nos han dado donde duele: han ido a por el {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegante{/g}, nuestro guía por la disformidad. Otros susurros me convocaban al ingeniarium... pero era demasiado tarde. Oí el grito de nuestro maestro visioingeniero... y el silencio que lo siguió».
languages.original_text: "The whispers called me — the ones I could make out among all the screams and screeches. Those who are rocking this boat hit us where it hurt — they went after the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, our guide through the warp. Other whispers called me to the enginarium... but it was too late. I heard the cry of our master cog... and the silence that followed."

traits.locale_text: «Los susurros me llamaron; los pocos que pude distinguir entre los gritos y los chillidos. Nuestros atacantes nos han dado donde duele: han ido a por el {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegante{/g}, nuestro guía por la disformidad. Otros susurros me convocaban al ingeniarium... pero era demasiado tarde. Oí el grito de nuestro maestro visioingeniero... y el silencio que lo siguió».

languages.text: 「あの悲鳴と叫びの中で聞き取れた囁きがあたいを呼んだ。この船を揺るがしている連中は、痛いところを突いてきた。彼らは<歪み>を通ってあたいたちのガイドである{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}を追った。他の囁き声があたいをエンジナリウムに呼んだけど、もう遅かった。主歯車の叫び声が聞こえ、その後に沈黙が襲った」
languages.original_text: "The whispers called me — the ones I could make out among all the screams and screeches. Those who are rocking this boat hit us where it hurt — they went after the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, our guide through the warp. Other whispers called me to the enginarium... but it was too late. I heard the cry of our master cog... and the silence that followed."

traits.locale_text: 「ささやきが私を呼んだ。すべての悲鳴や金切り声の中でも、私が聞き取れたささやき声。この船を揺さぶっている人たちが、私たちの痛いところを叩いている。彼らは<歪み>を通って私たちのガイドである{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}を追った。他のささやき声が私をエンジナリウムに呼んがしもう遅かった。私たちの主歯車の叫び声が聞こえ、その後沈黙が襲った」
「あの悲鳴と叫びの中で聞き取れた囁きがあたいを呼んだ。この船を揺るがしている連中は、痛いところを突いてきた。彼らは<歪み>を通ってあたいたちのガイドである{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}を追った。他の囁き声があたいをエンジナリウムに呼んだけど、もう遅かった。主歯車の叫び声が聞こえ、その後に沈黙が襲った」

languages.original_text: "The whispers called me — the ones I could make out among all the screams and screeches. Those who are rocking this boat hit us where it hurt — they went after the Navigator, our guide through the warp. Other whispers called me to the enginarium... but it was too late. I heard the cry of our master cog... and the silence that followed."

languages.text: « Ce sont les murmures qui m'ont appelée... ceux que j'ai pu discerner parmi les cris et les hurlements. Ceux qui cherchent à faire chavirer ce navire ont frappé notre point le plus sensible : ils s'en sont pris au {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g}, notre guide dans le Warp. D'autres murmures m'ont conduite à l'enginarium... mais c'était trop tard. J'ai entendu le cri de notre maître-rouage... et puis le silence qui a suivi. »
languages.original_text: "The whispers called me — the ones I could make out among all the screams and screeches. Those who are rocking this boat hit us where it hurt — they went after the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, our guide through the warp. Other whispers called me to the enginarium... but it was too late. I heard the cry of our master cog... and the silence that followed."

traits.locale_text: « Ce sont les murmures qui m'ont appelée... ceux que j'ai pu discerner parmi les cris et les hurlements. Ceux qui cherchent à faire chavirer ce navire ont frappé notre point le plus sensible : ils s'en sont pris au {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g}, notre guide dans le Warp. D'autres murmures m'ont conduite à l'enginarium... mais c'était trop tard. J'ai entendu le cri de notre maître-rouage... et puis le silence qui a suivi. »

languages.text: "Das Flüstern hat mich gerufen – soweit ich es in dem Geschrei und dem Kreischen verstehen konnte. Die Angreifer haben uns dort getroffen, wo es wehtut – ihr Ziel war der {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, unser Führer durch den Warp. Ein anderes Flüstern rief mich zum Maschinarium ... aber es war zu spät. Ich hörte den Schrei unseres Zahnradmeisters ... und die Stille danach."
languages.original_text: "The whispers called me — the ones I could make out among all the screams and screeches. Those who are rocking this boat hit us where it hurt — they went after the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, our guide through the warp. Other whispers called me to the enginarium... but it was too late. I heard the cry of our master cog... and the silence that followed."

traits.locale_text: "Das Flüstern hat mich gerufen – soweit ich es in dem Geschrei und dem Kreischen verstehen konnte. Die Angreifer haben uns dort getroffen, wo es wehtut – ihr Ziel war der {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, unser Führer durch den Warp. Ein anderes Flüstern rief mich zum Maschinarium ... aber es war zu spät. Ich hörte den Schrei unseres Zahnradmeisters ... und die Stille danach."

languages.text: "Fısıltılar, onca feryat figanın arasından duyduğum o sesler beni çağırdı. Kazan kaldıranlar, bizi can evimizden vurdular. Öteboyuttaki kılavuzumuz {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı'nın{/g} peşine düştüler. Başka fısıltılar da beni mühendishaneye çağırdı... Lakin çok geç kalmıştım. Bizim dişli başının feryadını işittim. Sonra da sükûnet hâkim oldu."
languages.original_text: "The whispers called me — the ones I could make out among all the screams and screeches. Those who are rocking this boat hit us where it hurt — they went after the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, our guide through the warp. Other whispers called me to the enginarium... but it was too late. I heard the cry of our master cog... and the silence that followed."

traits.locale_text: "Fısıltılar, onca feryat figanın arasından duyduğum o sesler beni çağırdı. Kazan kaldıranlar, bizi can evimizden vurdular. Öteboyuttaki kılavuzumuz {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g}'nın peşine düştüler. Başka fısıltılar da beni mühendishaneye çağırdı... Lakin çok geç kalmıştım. Çark ustasının feryadını işittim. Sonra da sükûnet hâkim oldu."
